All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BasicScrapper
This is the lowest level of a Scrapper.
Decorator
this class is a Decorator which builds the layers for the scrappers
Globals
this class serves as a macros class, similar to c/c++ macros. it is a singleton
h1Titles
a class to handle "h" requests (h1 titles in html)
Images
a class to handle "img" requests (images in html)
Links
a class to handle "a" requests (links (href) in html)
Main
This is the main class of the program, containing the main function.
Scrapper
This is an interface which used for scrapping data from sites.
ScrappersFactory
a class which holds all the acceptable tags the user can use.
Validator
this class used to validate the input
